title: BNB Chain Releases Layer 2 Testnet Based on Optimism's OP Stack - CoinDesk
content: Developers expect the opBNB testnet to reach speeds of 4,000 transactions per second (tps) at a targeted cost of 0.005 U.S. cents per transaction. These are similar speeds seen on blockchains such as Arbitrum, double those of BNB Chain, and significantly higher than Ethereum’s 30 tps.

title: BNB Smart Chain launches its opBNB layer 2 testnet - CryptoSlate
content:
Binance has announced the release of the opBNB testnet on the BNB Smart Chain (BSC).

The layer 2 product is touted as the answer to the scalability aspect of the blockchain trilemma – the other two aspects being security and decentralization.

Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin coined the term blockchain trilemma to describe a situation where developers are forced to forego one of the aspects in favor of the other two – as achieving all three aspects is impossible in the current state of technological development.

BSC is a fully compatible Ethereum Virtual Machine chain.

opBNB uses Optimistic Rollups

opBNB utilizes the Optimism OP Stack to achieve improved scalability, including Optimistic Rollups to process transactions off-chain – bundling them together to submit to the main chain.

The technology improves scalability and reduces the computational load on the main chain, making it easier to access data, improving the cache system, and enabling simultaneous operations.

According to BNB Chain, opBNB’s gas limit has been increased to 100M, allowing over 4,000 transactions per second and an average transaction cost below 0.005 USD.

Optimism OP Stack is an open-source collection of independent components, such as architectural layers or runtime environments, that work together to execute an app.

opBNB adopts a fraud-proving system to ensure transaction validity and network integrity. This mechanism allows anyone to challenge the results of a batched rollup transaction by computing a fraud-proof.

If proven fraudulent, the transaction(s) will be re-executed, maintaining the network’s integrity and instilling trust while fostering greater transparency.

BNB Chain calls on devs to experiment

BNB Chain said the opBNB testnet marks a new chapter in BSC’s journey to “creating a scalable, accessible, and cost-effective blockchain ecosystem.”

By inviting developers and projects to experiment with opBNB, BNB Chain hopes to foster the growth of diverse applications, including gaming apps and social networks, to pave the way for a more efficient and cost-effective blockchain environment.

The testnet launched on June 19, with developer resources now available.

title: Crypto Bear Reveals Price Targets for Ethereum (ETH) and Polygon (MATIC), Updates Outlook on Binance Coin (BNB) - The Daily Hodl
content:
A widely followed trader who has remained bearish on crypto markets this year despite the bounce is getting more confident on his calls for lower prices for several altcoins.

The pseudonymous trader known as Capo tells his Telegram followers that when Bitcoin (BTC) breached the $25,000 level to the downside last week, it was the beginning of a capitulation to much lower levels.

Looking at Binance Coin (BNB), Capo has a main target of around $40, which is about an 83% drop from current prices.

“BNB update:

Bad news coming in, and they never come alone. Expecting more bad news during this week, which should make price break the key support (range low, bottom dark zone in the chart). Below there, it could really be a free fall similar to FTT.

Same targets. I wouldn’t take profit on the first target, but I would take some profits on the main target if reached and leave part of the position open just in case.

Not financial advice.”

At time of writing, BNB is worth $242.

Turning to Ethereum (ETH), Capo says that the leading altcoin has already broken through a diagonal support level and is likely on its way down to much lower prices. The trader has a main price target somewhere between $650 and $550, or at least a 62% drop from current levels.

“ETH:

Main target: $550-650.”

At time of writing, Ethereum is trading for $1,732.

As for Ethereum scaling solution Polygon (MATIC), Capo says he’s looking for price targets as low as $0.04, which is a 93% plunge from current prices.

“MATIC update:

Short doing very well. Same as with BNB, adding several targets.”

At time of writing, MATIC is worth $0.60.

title: BNB Chain Unveils opBNB on Testnet to Enhance Scalability and Security - BSC NEWS
content:
BNB

opBNB will reportedly mitigate congestion, reduce transaction costs, and create a high throughput environment.

opBNB Joins the BNB Chain Ecosystem

BNB Chain introduced opBNB on testnet, a Layer 2 (L2) solution built on the OP Stack. Designed with a block gas limit of 100M gas, opBNB looks to revolutionize gaming, decentralized exchanges, and the world of digital collectibles, promising a seamless and efficient experience for users.

With opBNB, BNB Chain envisions a future where the platform serves as a dedicated high-performance ledger for gaming applications while Binance Smart Chain (BSC) acts as a secure settlement layer.

"opBNB represents our commitment to ensuring a seamless and efficient experience for users, developers, and projects on BSC. This development is part of our ongoing mission to bring the power of blockchain to everyone while embracing and driving forward innovation," stated BNBChain in an official statement.

As an Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) compatible layer 2 chain, opBNB leverages the Optimism OP Stack to enhance BSC scalability without compromising affordability and security.

As per reports, one of the key breakthroughs of opBNB lies in its utilization of Optimistic Rollups, which offloads computation and state storage off-chain. This shift alleviates congestion, reduces transaction costs, and enables a high throughput environment. While transactions are executed outside the chain, their data is posted to the Mainnet as call data, ensuring a secure and valid record of activity.

Moreover, opBNB operates within the broader BSC ecosystem, offering seamless interaction with a wide range of projects and tokens. Supported tokens include BNB, USDT, and other future ERC20 tokens on opBNB, providing developers and projects with a wealth of opportunities for collaboration and growth. $BNB is currently trading at $242.76, down 1.53% in 24 hours, according to CoinMarketCap.

‍

What is BNB Chain:

BNB Chain is a community-driven, decentralized, and censorship-resistant blockchain powered by BNB. It consists of BNB Beacon Chain and BNB Smart Chain. BNB Chain is EVM compatible and facilitates a multi-chain ecosystem. Through the concept of MetaFI, BNB Chain aims to build the infrastructure to power the world’s parallel virtual ecosystem.

For more information on BNB Chain, these links:

Website | Twitter | Discord | Telegram | GitHub |

title: Trade BRC-20 Tokens on BRC Chain with Your $BNB: Experience a Smooth and Rewarding Journey - BSC NEWS
content:
BTC

BRC Chain aims to revolutionize BRC20 and Ordinals trading by offering innovative services, including cross-chain bridging, an advanced AMM DEX, and more.

BRC Chain is revolutionizing the realm of BRC20 and Ordinals trading, offering a comprehensive solution that addresses pain points and propels the growth of this dynamic ecosystem. With its range of unique features and user-friendly interface, BRC Chain provides unparalleled opportunities for traders and enthusiasts alike.

Pain Points

Bridging Funds to the Bitcoin Network

Traditional bridges fall short in providing robust cross-chain services between the Bitcoin network and EVM chains. Relying on centralized exchanges is both risky and impractical, especially given recent events.

Inconvenient Trading Experience

The current BRC20 marketplace relies on order books, resulting in delays as traders wait for order matches. Unlike instant swaps available on other DeFi platforms, the absence of a robust DEX infrastructure on the Bitcoin network compounds the inconvenience.

High Fees and Slow Transactions

Bitcoin's network struggles to handle massive trading volumes, leading to exorbitant gas fees and sluggish transaction confirmations. This restricts traders from capitalizing swiftly on opportunities.

User-Unfriendly Experience

The concepts of BRC20 and ordinals are unfamiliar to many crypto traders, creating barriers to entry. Understanding transaction inscriptions, minting tokens, and calculating fees can be time-consuming and discouraging, hindering ecosystem growth.

BRC Chain's Solutions

Seamless Cross-Chain Bridging

BRC Chain enables seamless cross-chain transactions between Bitcoin networks and EVM chains like BNB Chain and Ethereum. It offers a secure and convenient solution, eliminating the reliance on centralized exchanges and opening new avenues for decentralized trading.

Advanced AMM DEX

With BRC Swap, the AMM DEX on BRC Chain, traders can enjoy a hassle-free trading experience. Leveraging automated market-making technology, BRC Swap facilitates instant swaps of BRC20 tokens, $BNB, $ETH, and $USDT, enhancing liquidity through farming pools.

Low Fees and Efficient Transactions

BRC Chain leverages its EVM appchain infrastructure to offer lower fees and faster transaction confirmations. Traders can enjoy cost-effective and efficient trading experiences, unburdened by high fees or prolonged confirmation delays.

User-Friendly Experience

BRC Chain prioritizes user experience, making the BRC20 and Ordinals ecosystem accessible to all. Intuitive interfaces, simplified transaction processes, and seamless navigation empower both crypto enthusiasts and newcomers to engage effortlessly in trading activities.

BRC Chain's Features

Farming Opportunities

BRC Chain empowers farmers to earn enticing APYs by participating in farming pools with BRC20 tokens, $BNB, $ETH, and $USDT. This incentivizes early adopters and provides a lucrative avenue for yield generation.

Link: https://swap.brcchain.io/farms

$BRC Rewards to Cover Fees

$BRC, the native token of BRC Chain, serves as a utility and rewards mechanism. Traders can claim $BRC from the faucet by completing tasks and use it to offset transaction fees. Initial bridgers also receive $BRC rewards when they bridge their assets for the first time from BNB Smart Chain, Bitcoin, or Ethereum.



Links:

BRC Faucet: https://faucet.brcchain.io/

BRC Bridge: https://bridge.brcchain.io/

Massive Airdrop Program

BRC Chain's airdrop program allocates over 198M $BRC (19.8% of the total supply) to early adopters and supporters. This generous distribution rewards those who contribute to the ecosystem's growth and success.

Links:

$BRC Airdrop Program

$BRC Airdrop Program Criteria

The Utility BRC-20 Token $kBRC:

$kBRC, the utility BRC-20 token of BRC Chain, represents kicking off the next level of BRC-20 trading. It was fairly launched on the Bitcoin network alongside the mainnet. $kBRC holds significant weight in the airdrop program and plays a vital role in the development and expansion of the BRC Chain ecosystem.

What's Next?

"Our dedication to unlocking the boundless potential of BRC-20 and Ordinals in the DeFi space remains steadfast," says Chris, co-founder and head of growth at BRC Chain. "While many lay claim to being pioneers, we proudly launched BRC Swap, the BRC-20 trading AMM, on the BRC Chain on May 23rd. Shortly thereafter, we swiftly expanded our support to include both BNB Smart Chain and Ethereum, enabling seamless cross-chain functionality. Our team of brilliant and relentless developers will persist in developing more DeFi products and broadening our support for the Ordinals ecosystem."

BRC Chain warmly welcomes BSC users to experience BRC-20 trading on its platform. Get ready to be captivated, and we eagerly await your feedback and suggestions!

Stay updated with BRC Chain via their Linktree.
